data.text: Israaʼel, ‘Yaa Waaqa keenya nu si beekna!’ jedhee
Taʼu iyyuu Israaʼel waan gaarii dideera;
Isaan walii galtee koo malee mootota moosifatan;
Yaa Samaariyaa, waaqa kee tolfamaa bifa jabbii sana baasii gati!
Isaan akkuma harree diidaa kan asii fi
Isaan saboota gidduutti yoo of gurguran iyyuu
“Efreem aarsaa cubbuutiif  iddoo aarsaa hedduu yoo hojjete iyyuu,
Ani waaʼee seera koo waan baayʼee isaaniif barreesseera;
